attributes.action: Make double crewing the norm  for Police and strengthen sentencing  guidelines
attributes.additional_details: As the parent of a service police officer, I have experience of the  physical and  psychological impact on  the individual and their family  of a savage attack. Every day,  we  wonder if  today will be the day we get the dreaded  call  . Every day, we support our  loved one to  go back out there and do a difficult job with pride and confidence.    We see at first hand how that confidence has been eroded by   government policy and we ask Parliament to  begin to  right this injustice
attributes.background: Attacks on police personnel  have increased. Police officers  deserve  the  protection of  society.  Actioning  these changes would send  a message of social justice  and  respect for police personnel.
